short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to switch between Offensive, Balanced and Defensive combat modes without having to leave the navigation screen.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Several buttons are shown on the navigation screen that will allow you to switch your current Advanced Combat state between OC (Offensive Combat), BA (Balanced) and DC (Defensive Combat) without the need to leave the navigation screen.

Should you change your Advanced Combat state while attacking a building, NPC or another pilot, this state will be reflected when you next return to the navigation screen.
